description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Commands to manage Application Configuration Service in Azure Spring Cloud.

commands.name: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service bind
commands.summary: Bind an app to Application Configuration Service.
examples: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service bind --app MyApp -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service clear
commands.summary: Reset all Application Configuration Service settings.

commands.name: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service show
commands.summary: Show the provisioning status, runtime status, and settings of Application Configuration Service.

commands.name: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service unbind
commands.summary: Unbind an app from Application Configuration Service.
examples: az spring-cloud application-configuration-service unbind --app MyApp -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup
